title: League buffering?
body: will Get into a game and then randomly my champ will be able to move but not auto and then everything will speed up extremely fast. Starting to get frustrated, also randomly get reconnecting when net is fine after testing multiple times and ping remaining below 60

replies.body: I just realised this is the same issue I’m having, didn’t realise with your thread title until after I just created another thread. Hopefully there is just a bug with something this patch and it’s fixed soon, I have to play other games currently.
